meanings.definition: Used to express agreement or solidarity with a statement or sentiment.
meanings.sent1: Metoo! I feel the same way.
meanings.sent3: When my friend said she loves ice cream, I shouted 'metoo'!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with joy as she exclaimed 'metoo' to the idea of a beach vacation.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with the chorus of 'metoo' as everyone shared their favorite color.

meanings.definition: A movement against sexual harassment and assault, especially on social media.
meanings.sent1: The #metoo movement has brought attention to important issues.
meanings.sent2: Many people have joined the metoo movement to support survivors.
meanings.sent3: During the metoo movement, social media was flooded with empowering stories.
meanings.sent4: Her courage to speak out added another voice to the metoo movement.
meanings.sent5: The metoo movement continues to inspire positive change in society.
